scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Kerry Stewart
scrape.text:
Will not be discussing at my next dinner like some of the reviews say you will.
Incredibly dislikable characters and the story was just full of holes. Half the time I had no clue what was happening and his lack of details kept me in a holding pattern. I had to finish the book to find out what happened but even after finishing it I'm still left with more questions than answers.
